description:
The Birdcage draws tighter and tighter around Dressrosa, threatening to destroy all life on the island kingdom! Meanwhile, Doflamingo stands down Luffy for a final confrontation, but a surprising twist shocks everyone on the top of the Royal Palace!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Blade of Tenacity! The Gamma Knife Counterattack!
Die Klinge des eisernen Willens – Der Gamma-Knife-Gegenangriff!
Shuunen no Yaiba: Gyakushuu no Gamma Knife!
Une lame de ténacité. Le Ganma Knife de la contre-attaque !
執念の刃 逆襲のガンマナイフ!
